  • View page source

Using Subplots to Display Multiple cv2 ImagesÂ¶

Example of how to use subplots to display multiple images:

import cv2
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

img_bgr = cv2.imread("../samples/polycom_simple.jpg")
img_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(img_bgr, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)

plt.figure(1)

plt.subplot(121)
plt.imshow(img_bgr)
plt.axis('off')
plt.title("Without B&R Channel Swapping")

plt.subplot(122)
plt.imshow(img_rgb)
plt.axis('off')
plt.title("With B&R Channel Swapping")

plt.show()
